297398491402080257.text: In Auburndale, #FL today I returned to taxpayers $360,000 in savings from my office budget. #sayfie http://t.co/srRzO1nH

296636966164893698.text: #Fox35 reports on cutting my office budget by more than 25 percent and returning the savings to taxpayers: http://t.co/notsA08Q #sayfie

296345658418421760.text: Unveiled check in #Tavares, #FL made out to hardworking #taxpayers in the amount of $360K saved from my office #budget http://t.co/lxZ02TCq

296324869560336385.text: I cut my office budget by $360,000 because Washington needs to spend less before it borrows more, and I believe that starts with me. #tcot
